definition: to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview

sentences.english: This is a matter of debate.
sentences.chinese: 这是个见仁见智的问题。

sentences.english: Whether it is a good idea to advertise the worship times of other churches is a matter of opinion.
sentences.chinese: 为其他教会宣传敬拜时间，是利是弊是见仁见智的事。

sentences.english: Whether or not calisthenics should be the object of author′s rights is a controversial topic.
sentences.chinese: 健美操能否成为著作权客体是个见仁见智的问题。

definition: The benevolent sees benevolence, the wise sees wisdom./Different views are admissible. (idiom)
pinyin: ren2 zhe3 jian4 ren2 , zhi4 zhe3 jian4 zhi4

definition: everyone has their likes and dislikes (idiom)
varying from person to person (idiom); different for each individual
one man's meat is another man's poison (idiom)
pinyin: jia3 zhi1 mi4 tang2 , yi3 zhi1 pi1 shuang1

definition: only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
to appraise/to pass judgment on/to speak ill of/praise and censure/appraisal
see 未可厚非[wei4 ke3 hou4 fei1]
